title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Enhancing Presence in Online Social Education: Experience-Based Community of Inquiry (CoI)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate social, teaching, and cognitive presence at over 80% in online discussions.

Applying the 3 CoI (Community of Inquiry) elements (social, teaching, cognitive) and Kolb’s learning cycle (experience-reflection-conceptualization-experimentation), learners analyze a problem occurring in a real work environment (e.g., AI system user experience improvement) and submit deliverables including a problem definition document, solution prototype, and evaluation report (meeting 80%+ of rubric criteria) within a 4-week project period
Learners can document experiential learning processes at least three times through peer feedback and reflective journals.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
